reviewText: While it does start out with the news coverage the night she died (including the news anchor not knowing what he was talking about regarding her injuries as so many did likewise) it cuts out half of the funeral service.  It is advertised as including the funeral service which to me means the entire service.  This DVD cuts out just about half of it.
way too short with info, we all know
Good service and not a bad price either.  Well satisfied with price as well as quality of merchandise.  They produced what they promised.

The quality of the reporting is clear and very informative.  However, this disc gives only the three main speeches made at the ceremony and little of the ceremony itself. It includes none of the music, neither choral or soloists like Elton John.  Thus, I found it to be a good summary of the event but not the event itself.

...it misses a lot too. There is of course the ABC "Special Report" segments but nothing about Prince Charles's journey to Paris to bring his ex-wife's body home. They've included the highlights of the funeral service but left out all of the music, which I remember as being very moving and they end without showing the hearse being showered with flowers. It just seemed they could have included more clips for the price of the DVD.

This is an excellent report of the death of Princess Diana.  It makes no judgements, it states facts.  I'd recommend this to anyone.  I just wish it was a little longer and gave more details!  I bought this as a set with the wedding of Prince Charles and Princess Diana.
I liked the presentation of this event.  Basically a video of the news on that day.  Not bad.
